price: Call upon your Lord humbly and privately, for He does not like the transgressors.
arabic: ٱدۡعُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ تَضَرُّعٗا وَخُفۡيَةًۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُعۡتَدِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: id'ʿū rabbakum taḍarruʿan wakhuf'yatan innahu lā yuḥibbu al-muʿ'tadīna
